title: Bug 7945: Search results not selected in external jar
description: When performing a search for references to a specific field in the external jar using Build 200201151, the first match is not selected. The steps to reproduce are as follows:
EB: The first match should be selected when double-clicking on the search result
SR:
1. Open the external jar using Build 200201151
2. Perform a search for references to a specific field
3. Double-click on the search result
